content.raw:
Hmm. Now that the doors pull request was merged, you should be getting something like this image:

![doors.jpg](data/bitbucket.org/repo/bae8oa/images/3155615790-doors.jpg)

Make sure you've pulled and updated gazebo_models on the default branch, then if the directory ~/.gazebo/models/drc_practice_hinged_door exists, delete it and try again. (Not a scalable solution, I know.)
content.html:
Hmm. Now that the doors pull request was merged, you should be getting something like this image:

Make sure you've pulled and updated gazebo_models on the default branch, then if the directory ~/.gazebo/models/drc_practice_hinged_door exists, delete it and try again. (Not a scalable solution, I know.)
